title: Pixen
description: A freelancing service platform built to connect clients with professional developers and designers. Pixen enables project listing, bidding, real-time chat, and secure delivery workflows.

title: LabourHub
description: This platform is a game-changer for daily wage workers, connecting them to job providers seamlessly.

title: Refer Me
description: An online platform for engineering students, built using the MERN stack and utilizing Firebase and MongoDB for database storage

title: BeyondChat
description: A user-friendly frontend interface integrating web scraping capabilities and a chatbot for seamless data extraction and user interaction.

title: DevLink-Connect
description: A developer connection platform to facilitate networking among coding professionals.

title: Random GIF Generator
description: A fun web app that fetches and displays random GIFs using the Giphy API.

title: WEATHER APP
description: A Node.js app fetching real-time weather data using OpenWeatherMap API and displaying it beautifully.

title: Profile-MD
description: A frontend for a profile management system that renders developer profiles from Markdown content.

title: OSimulate
description: Simulation of key operating system algorithms in C++ for educational use.

title: Hotel Management System
description: A command-line-based hotel management system written in Python. Supports booking, food ordering, and payments.
